name: Understanding Illicit Supply Chains
description: Investigating how global crime networks control logistics, distribution, and market penetration.
focus: Supply Chain Disruptions and Weak Points

cards.title: Drug and Arms Trafficking Networks
cards.description: Mapping the routes and logistics of global illicit trade.
bulletpoints: Understanding how drugs and weapons move across international borders.
Key trafficking hubs and transit points worldwide.
How cartels exploit legal and illegal transport networks.

cards.title: Human Trafficking and Smuggling Operations
cards.description: Exposing the global infrastructure behind human trafficking rings.
bulletpoints: Identifying major trafficking hotspots and victim profiles.
How criminal syndicates control victims through coercion and financial debt.
Tracking recruitment methods and digital exploitation tactics.

cards.title: Disrupting Illicit Supply Chains
cards.description: Tactics for disrupting and weakening organized crime networks.
bulletpoints: Identifying weak points in cartel logistics and distribution networks.
Coordinating multi-agency investigations for supply chain disruption.
Leveraging economic and geopolitical factors to cut off syndicate funding.
